articles.author: SI Reporter
articles.title: Sensex gyrates 376 pts, ends 66 pts down; Sun Pharma zooms 10%, Tech M 7% - Business Standard
articles.description: Domestic equities witnessed sharp profit booking in the fag end of the session as European stocks slipped in early trade and US stock futures hinted at a muted start on Wall Street later today
articles.content:
SI Reporter | New Delhi
 
Last Updated at July 30, 2021 16:23 IST

articles.author: Jamie Crawley
articles.title: Binance to Wind Down Derivatives in Europe; Malaysia Orders Closure - CoinDesk - CoinDesk
articles.description: Cryptocurrency exchange Binance is to wind down futures and derivatives products across Europe.
articles.content: Binance’s regulatory woes worsened Friday as Malaysia ordered it to halt operations in the country, and the cryptocurrency exchange said it’s planning to wind down futures and derivatives products ac… [+1443 chars]
